conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model correctly identifies wall heights and provides a clear isometric-style cutaway view.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and clean cutaway logic.

geometric_accuracy.notes: The core layout is largely preserved, though some internal wall partitions are simplified or slightly shifted.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is well-placed and matches room logic, though the scale of some bedroom items feels slightly large.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and lighting; no disruptive text or UI elements.

detected_errors.description: Minor distortion in the proportions of the central living area versus the 2D plan.
Some window placements on the outer perimeter differ slightly from the 2D architectural dimensions.

summary: A high-quality 3D conversion that accurately interprets the 2D source into a legible and logically furnished isometric model.
